lexUnit.name: underwear.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: mass noun clothing worn under other clothes next to the skin.

sentence.text: Not that there 's any shortage of warm underwear for winter use .
On the day when it really mattered , my underwear was clean .

You had to wash your underwear in your cell at night .
